= camel version

Manage Camel versions


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel version [options]
----


== Subcommands

[cols="2,5",options="header"]
|===
| Subcommand | Description
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-version-get.adoc[get] | Displays current Camel version
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-version-list.adoc[list] | Displays available Camel versions
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-version-set.adoc[set] | Set/change current Camel version
|===



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
